snippet: A day after the Supreme Court blocked a Texas law that had forced abortion clinics to close, some prepared to reopen, pleased at the reprieve but mindful that the legal fight was far from over.
abstract: Some Texas abortion clinics prepare to reopen, day after Supreme Court blocked state law that had forced clinics to close; legal experts say order increases chances of major face-off in Supreme Court over crucial question of what restrictions add up to 'undue burden' on women seeking an abortion.
lead_paragraph: A day after the Supreme Court blocked a Texas law that had forced abortion clinics to close, some prepared to reopen, pleased at the reprieve but mindful that the legal fight was far from over.

headline.main: Texas Abortion Clinics to Reopen Despite a Future in Legal Limbo
headline.print_headline: Texas Abortion Clinics to Reopen Despite a Future in Legal Limbo
